entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
